1.title: Georgia Peach Pool Paradise
1.plot: The Parrish family has saved their whole lives to build a tropical pool paradise in the heart of Georgia. But not everything is peachy on this build when hard soil and a complicated lazy river design present major challenges for the team.

2.title: Vegas Jackpot Swimming Pool
2.plot: A Las Vegas family hits the jackpot when Paul and Brian come to design the pool of their dreams. The guys are put to the test to turn the narrow desert yard into a world of water that includes splash pads, an outdoor kitchen and a pro volleyball net.

3.title: Southern Oasis Pool
3.plot: A family wants to turn their flat Houston, TX, yard into a Southern oasis. Unpredictable weather, tricky soil conditions and some new material leaves Paul and Brian figuring out how to blow the family's expectations out of the water.

4.title: Texas-Sized Retreat
4.plot: They say everything's bigger in Texas, and the pools are no exception. In Houston, the Pool Kings are facing a big backyard and even bigger expectations, like all-natural materials, from their interior design client.

5.title: Dueling Waterslides
5.plot: Brian and Paul design the perfect pool complete with giant dueling water slides. They face a slippery slope, however, when they battle equipment issues while building an artificial hill to support tens of thousands of pounds of natural granite rock.

6.title: A Pool with a View
6.plot: Paul and Brian learn the hard way that it isn't always so sunny in California as they transform an odd-shaped outdoor space into an elevated pool with an ocean view.

7.title: Mountain Lake Resort Pool
7.plot: An active family in Southern California want an extravagant pool to remind them of their favorite lakeside vacations. The Pool Kings don't know which is bigger, their clients' wish list or the 20-foot jumping cliff they have to create from scratch.

8.title: Million Dollar View Pool
8.plot: The King family seeks help building their new palace in the sunny hills of California; the Pool Kings find themselves between a rock ledge and a hard design while bringing this build to life on a sloped property.

9.title: Dream Pool
9.plot: Vic and Yukari just moved into a new California community, but they left their beloved pool behind. Brian and Paul have the huge challenge of creating an epic pool in a small space, including an exposed wall of acrylic holding back 160,000 pounds of water.

10.title: Million Dollar View Pool
10.plot: The King family is building their new palace in the sunny California hills and need the help of the Pool Kings. Paul and Brian find themselves between a rock ledge and hard design to bring to life on the slippery slope of this property.

1.title: The Pirate Treasure Pool
1.plot: Kelly and his crew build a modern, kid-friendly pool and an epic pirate-themed water park that only they can pull off.

2.title: The Miner Adventure Pool
2.plot: Kelly and his team work to deliver a natural, functional pool for all ages and a giant mine shaft-themed pool under a tight deadline and inclement weather.

3.title: Tennessee Dream Pool
3.plot: The Yarbrough family, Franklin Tennessee locals, call upon the experts at Peek Pools and Spas to build their dream pool. They've dreamt of having a backyard pool and entertaining space to complete their forever home, and before the whole family returns from London the team at Peek Pools needs to make their dream a reality. The Yarbrough's won't be around during construction, so the surprise of their life awaits them when they return home.

4.title: Desert Oasis in Sin City
4.plot: Two best friends Mike Baldasare and Jim Bellamy build award-winning pools for clients all across the Southwest. This time they head to Las Vegas to build a tropical dream pool for a family of six.

2.title: From Eyesore to Ultimate Pool Party Paradise
2.plot: A family that loves to entertain relocates from Chicago to Nashville and is in desperate need of a pool for the hot summer days. However, their current backyard is an eyesore and not functional for the kids, so the renovation experts work to transform the space into the ultimate pool party paradise.

3.title: Champagne Spa Wishes and Forever-Home Dreams
3.plot: Grandparents Joe and Beth want to add a dream pool to their forever home so they can host more family events. They hope the addition of this backyard oasis will complete their dream home and allow them to create many more memories outside.

4.title: Perfect Time for a Pool and Backyard Oasis
4.plot: A Houston family is ready to make their dream pool a reality. Kyle and Justin accept the challenge to create a dynamic resort-like pool. This family's outdoor fun is going to be taken to the next level.

5.title: A Natural Fit for a Fun Family
5.plot: After moving to their forever home, a young family from College Grove, TN, is ready to build their dream pool. The Pool Kings accept the challenge, creating a tropical paradise with a massive waterfall, a swim-up bar and an oversized outdoor kitchen.

6.title: A Rocky Road to Backyard Bliss
6.plot: A Nashville family is ready for Kyle and Justin to build the perfect pool in their backyard. The project gets off to a 4,000-pound rocky start, but that doesn't slow down the Pool Kings. Kyle and Justin deliver a phenomenal backyard complete with a massive waterfall, a beautiful pavilion and even light the water on fire.

7.title: Living La Vida Lakeside
7.plot: After 14 years of dreaming, a Lake Jackson, Texas, family is finally building their custom home on a piece of land around Pecan Lake. Located on a peninsula, the backyard leaves the ideal space to build a one-of-a-kind vanishing edge pool.

8.title: From Flawed to Flawless
8.plot: A Franklin, TN, couple enlists the Pool Kings to build their dream pool in their very challenging backyard. From steep slopes and tight access to tough weather conditions, Kyle and Justin have their work cut out for them to deliver a one-of-a-kind backyard paradise.

9.title: Rockin' Out
9.plot: A Nashville family hopes to make a big splash in their community, with a new resort style swimming pool in their backyard. But Kyle and Justin are in for some unforeseen challenges. The Pool Kings hammer through 10 feet of solid rock to contour out a perfect pool. This backyard transforms into a family fun zone complete with a spa, waterfall, and oversized tanning ledge.

10.title: From Overgrown to Over the Top
10.plot: A Franklin, TN family is in desperate need of a pool rescue. They have been living with an unfinished pool for over 2 years. Kyle and Justin step in to transform this backyard from a state of chaos to something beyond the family's wildest dreams.

11.title: Slip Sliding Into Paradise
11.plot: A young Franklin, TN family struggles to enjoy their backyard, because the landscape is too steep for the kids to even play on. They call in the Pool Kings for their expertise in designing them their own piece of paradise. Kyle and Justin build a family fun zone equipped with a waterfall, fire pit, and custom waterslide.

2.title: All the Way Around
2.plot: Mike and Jim have their work cut out for them when a Palm Springs couple wants to transform their narrow three-sided backyard into a personal resort by adding a grotto, zen area, putting green, oversized spa and beach entry.

3.title: Gotta Have My Grotto
3.plot: A young family from Carlsbad, CA, wants a nice backyard where the kids can play. Mike and Jim are up for the challenge and build a power-packed pool with a spa, underwater volcano, custom slide and a Tuscan grotto.

4.title: I'm on Vacation Already
4.plot: Now that the interior of their dream house is finished, a Rancho Cucamonga family of five asks the Pool Kings to transform their neglected backyard into a relaxing multi-level private resort with a waterfall grotto, huge spa, swim-up bar, outdoor living room and tropical landscaping.

5.title: This Pool Goes Up
5.plot: A young family in a new house is hoping for some help upgrading their backyard in the form of a top-notch swimming pool. The pool of their dreams has a waterfall, a customized spa and a fire feature that accentuates their beautiful Texas view. While these features will all be beautiful additions, their backyard is 12 feet below the patio forcing this extra-deep pool to go up.

6.title: Texas Staycation Paradise
6.plot: A young family wants to build a "refined rustic" staycation paradise in their Austin, TX, back yard. Mike and Jim answer the call by building their dream oasis with waterfalls, LED lights, a swim-up bar and a barbecue cabana as the finishing touch.

7.title: My Last Pool Was an Iron Tub
7.plot: A ranch family in Palm Desert, CA, is finally ready to build the desert oasis they've been dreaming of for 20 years. Mike and Jim are on hand to build the family a backyard paradise that includes a complex of waterfalls, a natural boulder spillway, a hidden waterslide and an outdoor kitchen. Will the end results be worth the family's wait?

8.title: Canyon Country Playground
8.plot: A big family on a large property in Santa Clarita, CA, wants to replace their old brick patio and pool with an updated design that is fun for everyone. Mike and Jim deliver on the dream by transforming the yard into a canyon country playground. The family's backyard oasis includes a 100-foot lazy river, a family-sized cave grotto, a network of massive waterfalls, a personal mountain range and a steel-reinforced rope swing.

9.title: Everything But the Trellis
9.plot: After moving into a lovely Santa Barbara, CA, home that once belonged to a master gardener, this family with little interest in gardening decides to get help. Mike and Jim are on hand to help build something that better suits the family's needs. They're turning a garden path into a swimming lane and the flowerbed into a stylish pool house. The home's charming trellis, however, stays put and makes the finished project a geometric masterpiece.

10.title: Stay the Course
10.plot: The Pool Kings head to Austin, Texas, to build a pool alongside a golf course. In additional to torrential rain, the guys have their work cut out for them as they work to create a feature-filled pool that works in all seasons, provides privacy from golfers and perfectly matches the newly built patio.

1.title: The Stakes Are High
1.plot: A young family recently relocated to College Grove, TN, and they desperately miss having a pool to enjoy. With a major elevation issue in their new backyard, Kyle and his team have a challenging build to tackle.

2.title: A Hole in the Plan
2.plot: An active Florida family recently traded in the tropical life for the cool countryside in Auburntown, Tennessee. Their scenic backyard is the prime location for a pool, but the Pool Kings discover something early in the build that may jeopardize this family's plan for a pool.

3.title: Welcome to Fire Island
3.plot: A hard-working family in Welcome, North Carolina is eager to finally have their first pool. Their expansive backyard allows Kyle and Justin to build an over-the-top resort style pool. In addition to a 30-foot waterfall and a lazy river, the Hartley family will have a one-of-a-kind feature, a sunken fire pit island.

5.title: It's About Time
5.plot: A family that had to delay pool plans after building a new home is finally ready to make their backyard vision a reality. The Pool Kings design an elegant and sophisticated pool for this eager bunch, but some obstacles along the way cause them to go back to the drawing board.

6.title: Slidin' Into Home
6.plot: A Texas family who recently moved back to North Carolina wants to add a pool to their 70-acre property. The Pool Kings design a pool packed with fun features including a custom slide, a gorgeous waterfall, and a massive outdoor kitchen so they can celebrate their homecoming properly with a brand new pool.

7.title: Bling by the Bay
7.plot: A Florida family recruits the Pool Kings to design a sleek, modern pool for their new oceanfront home on Tampa Bay. The crew creates an over-the-top pool with a vanishing edge spa and a roman soaking tub that's adorned with LED lighting and fire bowls.

-1.title: Making a Splash in Arizona
-1.plot: Premier Paradise and the Pool Kings help clients Sally and Samer kick-start their new life in Arizona with a custom resort-style backyard that features three gravity-defying waterfalls, a BBQ pit, a floating table and a fire pit.

imdb.plot outline: Cascading 15-foot waterfalls; luxury grottos and swim up bars are nothing for the Pool Kings. Follow along as they create over the top award-winning dream pools for their clients. From your own custom lake to a show-stopping backyard water park, the sky is the limit when the Pool Kings are on the job.
imdb.title: Pool Kings
plot: Cascading 15-foot waterfalls; luxury grottos and swim up bars are nothing for the _Pool Kings_ (qv). Follow along as they create over the top award-winning dream pools for their clients. From your own custom lake to a show-stopping backyard water park, the sky is the limit when the _Pool Kings_ (qv) are on the job.::DIY Network
